query.statement:
SELECT CUISINE_TYPE AS CD , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'FS0003' AND CODE = A.CUISINE_TYPE) NM , COUNT(*) CNT
, FMM_MENU_EVAL_NAME_FUN(#UPJANG#,#SUBINV_CODE#,#MENU_DATE#,#MENU_DATE#,'AND B.CUISINE_TYPE= ''' || CUISINE_TYPE || '''') INFO
, FMM_MENU_EVAL_NAME_FUN(#UPJANG#,#SUBINV_CODE#,#MENU_FDATE#,#MENU_TDATE#,'AND B.CUISINE_TYPE= ''' || CUISINE_TYPE || '''') INFO
FROM FMM_RECIPE A WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND MENU_CD IN ( SELECT MENU_CD FROM FMM_MENU WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND SUBINV_CODE = #SUBINV_CODE#
AND MENU_DATE = #MENU_DATE#
AND MENU_DATE BETWEEN #MENU_FDATE# AND #MENU_TDATE#
) AND CUISINE_TYPE NOT IN ( SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'FS0037' ) GROUP BY CUISINE_TYPE HAVING COUNT(*)>1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC,CUISINE_TYPE
